maqras.text: kul uhiye ileyye ennehu-steme`a neferum mine-lcinni fekalu inna semi`na kur'anen `aceba
yehdi ile-rrusdi feamenna bih. velen nusrike birabbina ehada
veennehu te`ala ceddu rabbina me-ttehaze sahibetev vela veleda
veennehu kane yekulu sefihuna `ale-llahi setata
veenna zanenna el len tekule-l'insu velcinnu `ale-llahi keziba
veennehu kane ricalum mine-l'insi ye`uzune biricalim mine-lcinni fezaduhum raheka
veennehum zannu kema zanentum el ley yeb`ase-llahu ehada
veenna lemesne-ssemae fevecednaha muliet harasen sedidev vesuhuba
veenna kunna nak`udu minha meka`ide lissem`. femey yestemi`i-l'ane yecid lehu sihaber rasada
veenna la nedri eserrun uride bimen fi-l'ardi em erade bihim rabbuhum raseda
veenna minne-ssalihune veminna dune zalik. kunna taraika kideda
veenna zanenna el len nu`cize-llahe fi-l'ardi velen nu`cizehu heraba
veenna lemma semi`ne-lhuda amenna bih. femey yu'mim birabbihi fela yehafu bahsev vela raheka
veenna minne-lmuslimune veminne-lkasitun. femen esleme feulaike teharrav raseda
veemme-lkasitune fekanu licehenneme hataba
veel levi-stekamu `ale-ttarikati leeskaynahum maen gadeka
lineftinehum fih. vemey yu`rid `an zikri rabbihi yeslukhu `azaben sa`ada
veenne-lmesacide lillahi fela ted`u me`a-llahi ehada
veennehu lemma kame `abdu-llahi yed`uhu kadu yekunune `aleyhi libeda
kul innema ed`u rabbi vela usriku bihi ehada
kul inni la emliku lekum darrav vela raseda
kul inni ley yucirani mine-llahi ehaduv velen ecide min dunihi multehada
illa belagam mine-llahi verisalatih. vemey ya`si-llahe verasulehu feinne lehu nara cehenneme halidine fiha ebeda
hatta iza raev ma yu`adune feseya`lemune men ad`afu nasirav veekallu `adeda
kul in edri ekaribum ma tu`adune em yec`alu lehu rabbi emeda
alimu-lgaybi fela yuzhiru `ala gaybihi ehada
illa meni-rteda mir rasulin feinnehu yesluku mim beyni yedeyhi vemin halfihi rasada
liya`leme en kad eblegu risalati rabbihim veehata bima ledeyhim veahsa kulle sey'in `adeda
ya eyyuhe-lmuzzemmil
kumi-lleyle illa kalila
nisfehu evi-nkus minhu kalila
ev zid `aleyhi verattili-lkur'ane tertila
inna senulki `aleyke kavlen sekila
inne nasiete-lleyli hiye eseddu vat'ev veakvemu kila
inne leke fi-nnehari sebhan tavila
vezkuri-sme rabbike vetebettel ileyhi tebtila
rabbu-lmesriki velmagribi la ilahe illa huve fettehizhu vekila
vasbir `ala ma yekulune vehcurhum hecran cemila
vezerni velmukezzibine uli-nna`meti vemehhilhum kalila
inne ledeyna enkalev vecehima
veta`amen za gussativ ve`azaben elima
yevme tercufu-l'ardu velcibalu vekaneti-lcibalu kesibem mehila
inna erselna ileykum rasulen sahiden `aleykum kema erselna ila fir`avne rasula
fe`asa fir`avnu-rrasule feehaznahu ahzev vebila
fekeyfe tettekune in kefertum yevmey yec`alu-lvildane siba
essemau munfetirum bih. kane va`duhu mef`ula
inne hazihi tezkirah. femen sae-ttehaze ila rabbihi sebila
